title: Ticket #3835: Master should be able to list the running daemons
description:
Idle thought-

HTCondor has command line tools to turn daemons on, off, or restart them. However - to my knowledge - there's no CLI to list the running daemons (and/or when they last checked in with the master).

If I wanted to use a condor_master to really manage applications, it seems this would be important functionality.
